projects.name: A Sociometric AI Screening Tool to Risk-Stratify Infant Neurodevelopmental Trajectories (STARS)
projects.summary: Aiming to develop a screening tool
highlights: Developed a multimodal pipeline for emotion recognition on spontaneous infant-mother interaction videos
Analyzed infant's facial expressions w.r.t. cultural backgrounds, sexes, and ages
Adopted the Pyannote library for speaker diarization on infant-mother interaction

publications.name: MASA-TCN: Multi-anchor Space-aware Temporal Convolutional Neural Networks for Continuous and Discrete EEG Emotion Recognition
publications.publisher: IEEE Journal of Biomedical and Health Informatics

publications.name: Multimodal Continuous Emotion Recognition: A Technical Report for ABAW5
Continuous emotion recognition using visual-audio-linguistic information: A technical report for abaw3
Visual-to-EEG cross-modal knowledge distillation for continuous emotion recognition
A context-aware locality measure for inlier pool enrichment in stepwise image registration
Point set registration with global-local correspondence and transformation estimation
